# SchoolERP
SchoolERP is a comprehensive, modern operating system designed for Indian small and budget private schools. It automates academics, finance, safety, operations, and parent communication, serving as a unified system to prevent revenue leakage and reduce manual paperwork.

## Key Principles
- Affordability and ease of use for vernacular medium and small schools.
- Parent app focuses on clean communication, explicitly aiming to "Reduce WhatsApp Chaos".
- Inspection-ready outputs (Bonafide, Report Cards, Fee Registers) requiring zero manual typing.
- Built-in AI Assistants and WhatsApp are treated as premium add-ons.

- School Fee Management Software: https://schoolerp.com/features/school-fee-management-software

- Report Card Software for Schools: https://schoolerp.com/features/report-card-software-for-schools
- Transfer Certificate Management: https://schoolerp.com/features/transfer-certificate-management
